description:
Wallpaper for imitating the Windows 98 desktop experience

This wallpaper includes Windows 98's Channel Bar and the startup sound.

Some channel items won't show properly because of the limitations of the iframe security restrictions.

Powered by https://jdan.github.io/98.css/

Right click this wallpaper and click 'Open in Explorer' to view the source code and the license (MIT.)

Visit https://winclassic.boards.net to learn how to get the classic theme on Windows 8+ or Windows 7 with Aero enabled.

Source code: https://github.com/Ingan121/ModernActiveDesktop
title: Windows 98 Desktop Experience
